This module implements binary fields.

                                       forbids: [].}
Returns true if any cell can pop. Note that this function is only slightly lighter than extractedPop. Source   Edit

func placeWaterHelper(existField: BinaryField; col: Col): int {.inline, noinit,
    ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Returns the highest row where a cell exists in the air. If not, returns the highest row where no cell exists. If the water is full (and the air is empty), returns -1. Source   Edit
